at.sudo200.JConsole

Class JConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.sudo200.JConsole.JConsole

  • public class JConsole
extends java.lang.Object
    Library for fancy terminal formatting. Ported from C using JNI.
    Author:
    sudo200

    • Method Detail

      • closeConsole

        public static void closeConsole()
        Disables console
        See Also:
        initConsole()

      • clrscr

        public static void clrscr()
        Clears the console window. Hint: The cursor is moved in the process.
        See Also:
        gotoxy(int xpos, int ypos)

      • delay

        public static void delay(int msec)
        Waits specified amount of milliseconds
        Parameters:
        msec - Milliseconds to wait.

      • gotoxy

        public static void gotoxy(int x,
                          int y)
        Moves the cursor to the specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate to move to. Starts at zero.
        y - Y-Coordinate to move to. Starts at zero.

      • initConsole

        public static void initConsole()
        Initialises console. ALWAYS CALL BEFORE USING ANY OTHER METHOD!
        See Also:
        closeConsole()

      • setCursorType

        public static void setCursorType(int type)
        Sets which type of cursor to use. Hint: Use constants
        Parameters:
        type - Value specifying the cursor size.
        See Also:
        JConsole

      • textbackground

        public static void textbackground(int c)
        Changes the background color. Hint: For best results, use in combination with clrscr()
        Parameters:
        c - Value from 0 to 7.
        See Also:
        clrscr(), JConsole

      • textcolor

        public static void textcolor(int c)
        Changes the text color.
        Parameters:
        c - Value from 0 to 15.
        See Also:
        JConsole
